content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ajmnugiqxczz6x2poc.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/refined/dbo.trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0'    
    ) 
WITH
    (
    [medallion] [nvarchar](50),
	[hack_license] [nvarchar](50),
	[vendor_id] [nvarchar](50),
	[rate_code] [nvarchar](50),
	[store_and_fwd_flag] [nvarchar](50),
	[pickup_datetime] [datetime2](7),
	[dropoff_datetime] [datetime2](7),
	[passenger_count] [nvarchar](50),
	[trip_time_in_secs] [nvarchar](50),
	[trip_distance] [float],
	[pickup_longitude] [nvarchar](50),
	[pickup_latitude] [nvarchar](50),
	[dropoff_longitude] [nvarchar](50),
	[dropoff_latitude] [nvarchar](50) 

    ) AS [result];
